A3¶

Note

This page Contains Python Library Definitions For XIQ A3 Menu

A3Inventory¶

class xiq.flows.a3.A3Inventory.A3Inventory¶

Bases: xiq.elements.A3InventoryWebElements.A3InventoryWebElements

enable_ssh_access_on_a3_node(a3_addr, account, password, ssh_pass, duration)¶

  • This Keyword Will enable SSH Access for A3 Version 3.2 Nodes

Parameters

  • a3_addr – A3 Node IP Address

  • account – A3 Login username

  • password – A3 Login Password

  • ssh_pass – A3 Node SSH Password

  • duration – Duration in Days to enable SSH access

Returns

1 if ssh enabled successfully on A3 Node else -1

format_row(row)¶

  • This Keyword will give formatted row data

  • Flow A3–>Inventory

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Format Row  ${ROW}

Parameters

Row – A3 Inventory Grid Row

Returns

return Formatted Row Information

get_a3_node_row(a3_host_name)¶

  • Get the A3 Node row object from the A3 Inventory grid

  • Flow A3–>Inventory

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Get A3 Row  ${A3_HOST_NAME}

Parameters

a3_host_name – A3 Node Host Name

Returns

returns the row object

get_a3_node_status(a3_server_name, a3_node_name)¶

  • This keyword returns the A3 Node status by searching host name

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Get A3 Node Status    ${A3_HOST_NAME}

Parameters

  • a3_server_name – A3 Server Host Name

  • a3_node_name – A3 Node Host Name

Returns

‘green’ if the A3 Node is online else return -1

get_a3_server_row(a3_host_name)¶

  • Get the A3 server row object from the A3 Inventory grid

  • Flow A3–>Inventory

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Get A3 Row  ${A3_HOST_NAME}

Parameters

a3_host_name – A3 server Host Name

Returns

returns the row object

get_a3_server_status(a3_host_name)¶

  • This keyword returns the A3 Virtual Server status by searching host name

  • Flow A3–>Inventory

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Get A3 Server Status    ${A3_HOST_NAME}

Parameters

a3_host_name – A3 Server Host Name

Returns

‘green’ if the A3 Server is online else return -1

link_a3_nodes_to_xiq(spawn, username, password, url='https://cloud.aerohive.com', timeout=40)¶

  • This Keyword Executes Curl Command to Link A3 Node to XIQ

  • It assumes that already opened SSH spawn of A3 Node.

Parameters

  • spawn – A3 Node ssh Spawn

  • username – XIQ User Name

  • password – XIQ Password

  • url – XIQ server URL

  • timeout – Spawn command timeout in seconds

Returns

output of the Executed Curl Command

search_a3_device(a3_host_name)¶

  • Searches for A3 server Host using its Host Name

  • It Assumes that its already Navigated to A3–>inventory Grid

  • Flow Inventory Grid

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Search A3 Device  ${A3_HOST_NAME}

Parameters

a3_host_name – A3 server Host Name

Returns

return 1 if A3 host found on A3 Inventory Grid else -1

unlink_a3_nodes_from_xiq(spawn, timeout=10)¶

  • This Keyword Executes Curl Command to UnLink A3 Node to XIQ

  • It assumes that already opened SSH spawn of A3 Node.

Parameters

  • spawn – A3 Node ssh Spawn

  • timeout – Spawn command timeout in seconds

Returns

output of the Executed Curl Command

validate_a3_page_after_unlink(a3_host_name)¶

  • This Keyword will Validate the A3 Page Text after Un linking A3 from XIQ

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Validate A3 Page After Unlink

Returns

verify_a3_node_login_on_xiq(a3_server_name, a3_node_name, a3_login_username, a3_login_password)¶

  • This keyword will verify A3 Node Access from XIQ UI using Go To A3 Button and Check A3 Login via XIQ

  • Assume that navigated to the A3 –> Inventory

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Verify A3 Node Login On XIQ   ${A3_SERVER_NAME}  ${A3_IP_ADDR}   ${A3_USERNAME}  ${A3_PASSWORD}

Parameters

  • a3_server_name – A3 Server Name

  • a3_node_name – A3 Node Name

  • a3_login_username – A3 Login Name to Access A3 UI

  • a3_login_password – A3 Login Password Access A3 UI

Returns

A3 UI Page Title if Able to Login Successfully

verify_a3_server_login_on_xiq(a3_host_name, a3_login_username, a3_login_password)¶

  • This keyword will verify A3 Server Access from XIQ UI using Go To A3 Button and Check A3 Login via XIQ

  • Assume that navigated to the A3 –> Inventory

  • Keyword Usage:

  • Verify A3 Server Login On XIQ   ${A3_IP_ADDR}   ${A3_USERNAME}  ${A3_PASSWORD}

Parameters

  • a3_host_name – A3 Server Host Name

  • a3_login_username – A3 Login Name to Access A3 UI

  • a3_login_password – A3 Login Password Access A3 UI

Returns

A3 UI Page Title if Able to Login Successfully
